title: Crime Alert 08.07.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.07.19
description:
Woman turns herself in on probation violation but forgets she has drugs hidden in her hair. Police find stolen money and meth in a woman's private place. Woman takes a Lyft to steal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
